channel.title: [Crash] bm_c2a2c (On A Rail)
channel.description:
It happens level change after boarding the new tram.
Screenshot: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96123123[/url] Crash Log: [url]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/46003529/hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T22_17_45C0.zip[/url]
On the 2nd try it worked, but the map was laggy till the tram crashed.
